tool_description: The meme generator is a straightforward tool that creates memes using preloaded images and short top and bottom text phrases. The resulting memes are available in the JPEG image file format.The meme generator is a straightforward tool that creates memes using preloaded images and short top and bottom text phrases. The resulting memes are available in the JPEG image file format.
name: Meme Generator
